column2: SELECT G.cx, G.cy, G.cz, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z, s.z as redshift, G.objID, G.modelMag_u, G.modelMag_r, G.modelMag_g, p.petroR5#_g, p.petroR5#_u, p.petroR5#_r, p.petroR5#_i, p.petroR5#_z, G.ra, G.dec into mydb.Blue_red_Galaxies from GALAXY as G JOIN SpecObj AS s ON s.bestobjid = G.objid JOIN PhotoObj AS p ON s.bestobjid = p.objid WHERE (G.Flags & (dbo.fPhotoFlags (#) + dbo.fPhotoFlags (#) + dbo.fPhotoFlags (#) )) = # and p.petroRad_r < # and (p.u - p.r) > # and (p.u - p.r) < = # - #* (p.g)
